subject: Re: ServerTestCase newbie
messageBody:
nobody?

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Joe Computer <Keith.Thomas@v...>"
<Keith.Thomas@v...> wrote:
> OK, I must be having a bad day because this should be so simple.
>
> 1. How do I invoke the session bean, TestRunnerSessionBean, shoudl I
> just write a quick class with a main, or a unit test with one test
> which is "testTestRunnerSessionBean"?
>
> 2. How do I invoke each of my test cases? I guess I invoke the
> runTestMethod() method on the test session bean. But this requires me
> to specfify every test I want run in every class. That cannot be
> correct?
>
> 3. The documentation says "Call the static ServerTestCase methods
> setEjbServerUrl and setInitialContextFactoryName". Call them from
> where? I can't find any examples of this.
>
> Sorry to be such a dummy, but I'm obviously missing the point here.
